articles.author: Jonathan Vanian
articles.title: Hands-on with Meta's Orion AR glasses prototype and the possible future of computing - CNBC
articles.description: CNBC senior media and tech correspondent Julia Boorstin experienced Meta's Orion AR glasses prototype, and was impressed by how lightweight they were.
articles.content:
The most impressive aspect of Meta's Orion augmented-reality glasses has more to do with size and comfort than flashy computer graphics.
CNBC senior media and tech correspondent Julia Boorstin was a… [+4717 chars]
